title: Revitalive Cafe and Juice Bar
typeOfFood: Vegan, American, Raw, Juice bar, Delivery, Take-out, Catering
description: Located in the solar-powered Tannery Mill Center, this quick service vegan cafe offers organic bowls, soups, smoothies, juices, and vegan desserts. Also makes chocolates, kale chips, and sprouted granola. Its menu features both raw vegan renditions of American favorites as well as daily specials highlighting seasonal local flavors. Everything is gluten free.
